name: Christmas Beam
description:
Just your friendly neighborhood Christmas beam, delivering seasonally-appropriate decorations and good cheer.

This is a mouse-controlled game -- click to activate the beam and move the mouse to direct it! For the Optimal Christmas Experience, play with sound!

This game doesn't work on certain Chrome browsers due to a Unity issue -- in that case try Safari, Firefox, or Netscape Navigator. If you get a Unity error in those cases...try restarting your browser? I'm as stumped as you are, my Christmas friend.
